definition: to take liberties with a woman/to dally/to assail a woman with obscenities
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
trick/drama/play/show/CL:齣|出[chu1],場|场[chang3],臺|台[tai2]
variant of 戲|戏[xi4]

sentences.english: In the inn, muleteers are teasing a beautiful waitress, Aldonza.
sentences.chinese: 在客栈中，骡夫们调戏著艾东莎。

sentences.english: I am convinced now that one of the the first things this guy did was to tease the girl.
sentences.chinese: 现在我确信这家伙做的第一件事就是调戏女孩。

sentences.english: He basically was just teasing Livingston with that dribble.
sentences.chinese: 他简直是用这运球调戏利文斯顿一样。

sentences.english: Wang Peng rescued the girl Chen Xiaoyue that is dallied with.
sentences.chinese: 王鹏搭救了被调戏的姑娘陈小月。

sentences.english: Some people use to get some work done by flirting others.
sentences.chinese: 一些人通过调戏其他人以完成工作。

sentences.english: Don't molest crops, women or prisoners of war.
sentences.chinese: 不损坏庄稼，不调戏妇女，不虐待战俘。

sentences.english: Kate could hardly believe that he would dare come on to her like that.
sentences.chinese: 凯特几乎不能相信他竟敢对她进行调戏。

sentences.english: There are no signs that she had been molested.
sentences.chinese: 没有迹象表明她被调戏过。

sentences.english: Finding something to tease a woman about is easy.
sentences.chinese: 发现能调戏女人的东西很容易。

sentences.english: And south rioux hospitality jia always in the nightclub, west chicken by jia always flirt.
sentences.chinese: 向南和丁原在夜总会款待贾总，西凤被贾总调戏。

sentences.english: Looking at a face she had love, men began to molest her.
sentences.chinese: 看着一脸生无可恋的女主，男主又开始调戏她。

sentences.english: The girl complained to the police that the man had been feeling her up on the train.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘向警方控诉那个男子在火车上一直在调戏她。

sentences.english: Your best bet is to deliver all your teasing lines as matter-of-fact statements with a deadpan, straight face.
sentences.chinese: 你最好是象陈述事实一般面无表情的说出调戏的台词。

sentences.english: In another case two Bangkok schoolteachers were accused of molesting pupils.
sentences.chinese: 在另一个案中，两名曼谷教师被指控调戏学生。
